titleStmt.title: A proclamation, prorogating the dyet for inbringing the accompts due by the forces.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the twenty ninth day of January, and of Our Reign the second year, 1691.
Signed: Da. Moncreif, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
